verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: will] finally visit the UK in July , according to multiple reports .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-TMP: finally] [V: visit] [ARG1: the UK] [ARGM-TMP: in July] , [ARGM-ADV: according to multiple reports] .
Donald Trump will finally visit the UK in July , [V: according] to multiple reports .
